title: Neon City Rain
prompt: A rain-soaked cyberpunk street at night with neon signs reflecting in puddles, a lone figure with an umbrella walking away from the camera, cinematic lighting, wide angle shot

title: Ancient Library
prompt: An impossibly tall ancient library with floating books and magical glowing orbs illuminating the shelves, warm golden light streaming through stained glass windows, fantasy concept art style

title: Cyberpunk Portrait
prompt: face of beautiful cyberpunk woman covered glowing matrix and circuits, colourful.

title: Noir-style Glamour
prompt: A beauty in a Noir-style fashion portrait, standing by a limousine in a rainy Hollywood street.

title: 84, Charing Cross Road
prompt: Movie still of "84, Charing Cross Road" (1987, British movie): A beautiful young lady ( Olivia Hussey in her early 20s )standing before a vintage bookshelf in the book store, reading an ancient book. She is beautiful, elegant, innocent, graceful, glamorous, looking at the book. Dramatic lighting, soft light emphasizes her beautiful face.

title: Neon Night Girl-Biker
prompt: Fantasy scene in the style of cyberpunk: attractive girl-biker with long wavy hair, decorated with colors, sits on a futuristic motorcycle, we see her sexy huge hips and back, she wears a shiny helmet with a reflective visor, The tight-fitting suit, with elements of decorative armor and patterns highlighting the figure,  soft neon glow , creating an atmosphere of romantic fantasy world. The style of the image is a highly detailed fantasy illustration with elements of cyberpunk and glamour, with an emphasis on contrast between metallic and delicate floral details, background slightly blurred to emphasize the main character and her motorcycle. Use cinematic light, realistic proportions, high detail and deep shades to enhance the effect of magical and futuristic atmosphere.

title: Aerodynamics Racer
prompt: A radical race car from tomorrow's circuits rockets through dual realities of speed. The vehicle itself is a masterpiece of aggressive aerodynamics—sharp angular lines, impossibly low profile, glowing energy accents cutting through space. Above, golden concentric rings pulse past like digital heartbeats. Below and behind, the world shatters into pure chromatic chaos: turquoise bleeds into electric pink, violet, orange—the car's wake painting rainbow fractals across reality. Sleek carbon-fibre surfaces catch both the warm ceiling glow and cool cyan tunnel light. This machine doesn't just race; it tears through dimensions, leaving trails of liquid light where physics used to be.
